https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sUzA6z2WUEwQD9trexbejoUotct.jpg Indu makes her boyfriend Krishna act like her friend Bhoomi's lover so that her family will stop searching for a groom. However, their lives takes a turn when Bhoomi falls in love with Krishna. Brindaavanam
